mapper.insert: insert into store (storeid, storename, storefullname, storeleader, storeqq, storetel, storeadress, storestatus) values (#{storeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storefullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeleader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storetel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update store set storename = #{storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storefullname = #{storefullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storeleader = #{storeleader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, storeqq = #{storeqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storetel = #{storetel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storeadress = #{storeadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storestatus = #{storestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where storeid = #{storeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select storeid, storename, storefullname, storeleader, storeqq, storetel, storeadress, storestatus from store where storeid = #{storeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select storeid, storename, storefullname, storeleader, storeqq, storetel, storeadress, storestatus from store
